name: High Moo
description:
DEVELOPER HIGH SCORE: 12020

Post your high scores in the comments!

((NOTE: we used Unity 2020 and WebGL builds are bugged, just refresh if it doesn't load or download the executable below, thank you!))

Controls (LTRO-1)

D-Pad = Arrow Keys/WASD - Movement

A = X or Space Bar - Shoot

B = Z or Left Alt  - Dash

Start = Enter/Return

Run across the wild wild west and collect money that the Coyote bandits stole from your town. Shoot up enemies that come in your way and try to avoid all the spiky cacti!

Credits

Pixel art & programming: @adroitcell.pxl

Level design & Character design: @TsuWhisperer

Concept Art, 2d Art & Box Art: @shroomae

Background Music: FoxSynergy

Pixel Western font by: Mirz (Michelle Lehmann)

Pixcell Caps font by: @adroitcell.pxl
